argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | istdrg2.m | |- M = ( mulGrp ` R ) |
| 2 |  | istdrg2.b | |- B = ( Base ` R ) |
| 3 |  | istdrg2.z | |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Unit ` R ) = ( Unit ` R ) |
| 5 | 1, 4 | #P_istdrg | |- ( R e. TopDRing <-> ( R e. TopRing /\ R e. DivRing /\ ( M |`s ( Unit ` R ) ) e. TopGrp ) ) |

| 7 | 6 | #P_simprbi | |- ( R e. DivRing -> ( Unit ` R ) = ( B \ { .0. } ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( R e. TopRing /\ R e. DivRing ) -> ( Unit ` R ) = ( B \ { .0. } ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ( R e. TopRing /\ R e. DivRing ) -> ( M |`s ( Unit ` R ) ) = ( M |`s ( B \ { .0. } ) ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_eleq1d | |- ( ( R e. TopRing /\ R e. DivRing ) -> ( ( M |`s ( Unit ` R ) ) e. TopGrp <-> ( M |`s ( B \ { .0. } ) ) e. TopGrp ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_pm5.32i | |- ( ( ( R e. TopRing /\ R e. DivRing ) /\ ( M |`s ( Unit ` R ) ) e. TopGrp ) <-> ( ( R e. TopRing /\ R e. DivRing ) /\ ( M |`s ( B \ { .0. } ) ) e. TopGrp ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_df-3an | |- ( ( R e. TopRing /\ R e. DivRing /\ ( M |`s ( Unit ` R ) ) e. TopGrp ) <-> ( ( R e. TopRing /\ R e. DivRing ) /\ ( M |`s ( Unit ` R ) ) e. TopGrp ) ) |
| 13 |  | #P_df-3an | |- ( ( R e. TopRing /\ R e. DivRing /\ ( M |`s ( B \ { .0. } ) ) e. TopGrp ) <-> ( ( R e. TopRing /\ R e. DivRing ) /\ ( M |`s ( B \ { .0. } ) ) e. TopGrp ) ) |
| 14 | 11, 12, 13 | #P_3bitr4i | |- ( ( R e. TopRing /\ R e. DivRing /\ ( M |`s ( Unit ` R ) ) e. TopGrp ) <-> ( R e. TopRing /\ R e. DivRing /\ ( M |`s ( B \ { .0. } ) ) e. TopGrp ) ) |
| 15 | 5, 14 | #P_bitri | |- ( R e. TopDRing <-> ( R e. TopRing /\ R e. DivRing /\ ( M |`s ( B \ { .0. } ) ) e. TopGrp ) ) |
